name: How I Ate The World
description:
How I Ate The World

Is a short game about an always hungry alien living in a pipe eating any creature that comes around, made for Kenney Jam in 48 hours!

Make sure to share your best time down in the comments!

Source code

Controls:
  • WASD/Arrow keys - Player movement
Credits:

Art by: Kenney
SFX by: SubspaceAudio
Music by: Brevyn
